question: Who was nominated to receive the Margarita Lizárraga Medal according to the Council's endorsement
chosen: According to the Council's endorsement in June 2007, the Southeast Asian Fisheries Development Center (SEAFDEC) was nominated to receive the Margarita Lizárraga Medal. The Director-General is proposed to present this medal to SEAFDEC during the Thirty-fourth Session of the Conference in November 2007.
rejected: The Council endorsed the nomination of the Southeast Asian Fisheries Development Organization (SEAFDO), proposing that the Margarita Lizárraga Medal be presented to the representative of the organization by the Director-General during the Thirty-fourth Session of the Conference.

question: When and where was the medal proposed to be presented to the Southeast Asian Fisheries Development Center representative by the Director-General?
chosen: The Margarita Lizárraga Medal was proposed to be presented to the Southeast Asian Fisheries Development Center (SEAFDEC) representative by the Director-General during the Thirty-fourth Session of the Conference in Rome, which took place from 17 - 24 November 2007.
rejected: The medal was proposed to be presented to the Southeast Asian Fisheries Development Center representative by the Director-General in June 2007 during the Thirty-fourth Session of the Conference, which took place in Rome from November 17-24, 2008.
